类 ScrollBarUI

java.lang.Object

org.am21.client.view.GUI.component.ScrollBarUI
所有已实现的接口:
LayoutManager, SwingConstants
public class ScrollBarUI extends BasicScrollBarUI
ScrollBarUI is a class that extends BasicScrollBarUI and is used to change the color of the scroll bar
